issue.title: typo in cmake file prevents loading of libAtlasSimInterface

content.raw:
Umm it is working in my desktop: precise. 

@hsu remove the built directory, setup again and please run:

```
make -j8 VERBOSE=1 | grep WITH_ATLASSIMINTERFACE
```
and see if the compiler is sending the proper parameter.

In case of a failure in detection, 
```
  13 if (NOT DEFINED USE_ATLASSIMINTERFACE_BLOB)
  14   if (LINUX)

  16     if(CMAKE_SIZEOF_VOID_P EQUAL 8)
```
One of these three things should be failing.
